questions.questionText: Which of the following is NOT a type used in TypeScript?
questions.explanation: enum is not used as a type in TypeScript

questions.questionText: In which of these does a class take parameters?
questions.explanation: a constructor is used by a class to take in parameters

questions.questionText: Which is NOT an access modifier?
questions.explanation: async is not used as an access modifier type in TypeScript

questions.questionText: Which keyword allows us to share information between files in TypeScript?
questions.explanation: the export keyword allows for the information to be transmitted between files

questions.questionText: Which is an array method to generate a new array based on a condition?
questions.explanation: filter is a method used to conditionally create a new array

shuffleQuestions.questionText: Which is an array method to generate a new array based on a condition?
shuffleQuestions.explanation: filter is a method used to conditionally create a new array

shuffleQuestions.questionText: Which is NOT an access modifier?
shuffleQuestions.explanation: async is not used as an access modifier type in TypeScript

shuffleQuestions.questionText: Which keyword allows us to share information between files in TypeScript?
shuffleQuestions.explanation: the export keyword allows for the information to be transmitted between files

shuffleQuestions.questionText: In which of these does a class take parameters?
shuffleQuestions.explanation: a constructor is used by a class to take in parameters

shuffleQuestions.questionText: Which of the following is NOT a type used in TypeScript?
shuffleQuestions.explanation: enum is not used as a type in TypeScript
